• Everyone has the right to a standard of living adequate for the health and well-being of themselves and their family, including food, clothing, housing, medical care, and necessary social services.

 	• Mothers and children are entitled to special care and assistance, before and after birth.

 	• All children, regardless of their parents' status, have the right to equal social protection.

 	• Everyone has the right to security in the event of unemployment, sickness, disability, widowhood, old age, or other lack of livelihood in circumstances beyond their control.

 	• Everyone has the right to education, which shall be free, at least in the elementary and fundamental stages. Elementary education shall be compulsory.
